title: Doran's / Tough skin fix?
body:
Doran's shield 

Reduce the damage taken (post mitigation) from champion basic attacks by 1 for every 100 units between you and the attacker. Doubled for melee champions taking damage from ranged champions. Your basic attacks against enemy champions disable this passive for 2 seconds.

Seems pretty simple to me, if Cait hits you from 500 range, you take 10 less damage as a melee champion, 5 if you are ranged. If you engage on someone,  your defenses are penalized. If you engage and the enemy adc kites well, your defenses are still compromised briefly.

replies.body: I think Dorans shield needs a small buff. These are pretty creative ideas.
Thanks. Honestly, I just tried to add in enough specifics to make it stronger against what people want it for without unnecessarily buffing it in cases where you are ahead.
